articles.title: Madden NFL 21 overhauls gameplay with real-life data, but only on PS5 and Xbox Series X - Polygon
articles.description: Madden NFL 21 on PlayStation 5 and Xbox Series X, launching Dec. 4, will bring five years’ worth of player-tracking data into the game to deliver more realistic movement and positioning for all 22 players on the field.
articles.content: Advanced player tracking, in real life, will deliver a stronger playing video game, developers say
